issue.title: gzclient segfault on startup using AMD graphics with Radeon Driver Ubuntu 16.04

content.raw: looking at the ogre [_renderScene](https://bitbucket.org/sinbad/ogre/src/8cbb135e8f47d9df064bcaf88fa2331d4b3ad975/OgreMain/src/OgreSceneManager.cpp?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#OgreSceneManager.cpp-1562) source code, it seems like we maybe able to avoid the crash by disabling clearing frames for viewports. There are quite a few viewports in gazebo, the most commonly used one would be in the Camera class, e.g. change all the [viewport->setClearEveryFrame](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/801eaafce237e0858670e9354ff9113fe2527f32/gazebo/rendering/Camera.cc?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#Camera.cc-1387) calls to `false`. I don't have a graphics card that suffers from this problem so I can't test this..
content.html: looking at the ogre _renderScene source code, it seems like we maybe able to avoid the crash by disabling clearing frames for viewports. There are quite a few viewports in gazebo, the most commonly used one would be in the Camera class, e.g. change all the viewport->setClearEveryFrame calls to false. I don't have a graphics card that suffers from this problem so I can't test this..
